title: Login Issue
description: User unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Credit card payment not processing successfully.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer requested dark mode option in the app.

title: Bug in Dashboard
description: Analytics chart not rendering correctly on Safari browser.

title: Email Notifications
description: Customer not receiving notification emails after signup.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: App crashes on startup for Android 12 users.

title: Profile Picture Upload
description: User unable to upload profile picture in settings.

title: Search Not Working
description: Search results page shows no data even with valid queries.

title: Password Reset
description: Password reset email not being sent to users.

title: Checkout Error
description: Items disappear from cart when proceeding to checkout.

title: Slow Loading
description: Homepage takes too long to load on slow networks.

title: Subscription Issue
description: Customer charged twice for monthly subscription.
